metadata.title: CVE-2018-8087 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Memory leak in the hwsim_new_radio_nl function indrivers/net/wireless/mac80211_hwsim.c in the Linux kernel through 4.15.9allows local users to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) bytriggering an out-of-array error case.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8087` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-23-generic - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-4.15.0-23-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-4.15.0-23-lowlatency - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-4.15.0-23-snapdragon - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-23-generic - 4.15.0-23.25
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-23-lowlatency - 4.15.0-23.25
No subscription required
